execution_quality: Good execution with systematic exploration of relevant files and iterative refinement. The agent successfully applied changes across 8 files with minimal errors (3 encountered, all recovered).
work_category: UI refinement task involving layout adjustments and icon sizing for a mobile list component. The agent made targeted edits to address padding, tile types, and label placement across multiple related files.
summary: The agent successfully completed UI refinement work by reading related files, identifying the affected components, and making targeted layout/sizing changes across multiple files. The work was focused and systematic, with the user accepting it immediately for commit, indicating good alignment with their intent though communication during the task could have been slightly clearer about the specific changes being made.
follow_up_pattern: User requested commit without additional changes, suggesting the work was acceptable and ready to version control. No follow-up iterations expected unless new issues arise.
